name: blog.fefe.de (Fefes Blog) - blau noch dunkler plus
description: My adaptation of "blog.fefe.de - blau noch dunkler", for the popular German blog by CCC member Felix von Leitner. Includes changes to FAQ and RSS. Updated in August 2014 to cover recent HTML changes and the CSS3 "border-radius" property. Updated in January 2015 to cover paragraphs with updates.
